metadata.title: Colostomy Barrier New Image Flextend 2-3/4" Blue Code Hydrocolloid Cut-to-fit, Up to 2-1/4" (#14604, Sold Per Box)
features: Actual Product Image May Vary. See Product Details and Features for Specifications.
description: Colostomy barrier new look Flextend trim to fit, extended wear tape 2-3/4 inch flange code blue hydrocolloid up to 2-1/4 inch stoma. Manufacturer Name: Hollister. Manufacturer number: 14604. Brand: New Image Flextend. Application: colostomy barrier. Adhesive Type: Tape Flange Size: 2-3/4" flange. Pack of 5 units. Flat barrier for prolonged use. 23 1/4-inch flange. Confidence assured with the floating flange; provides maximum security with the patented locking system that audibly "clicks" into place. Protects the skin for a long time from irritating discharge. Eliminate pressure on post-op abdominals with the unique floating flange. Colour: blue.
